title: São Cândido (Capela de)
body: In the place called Fonte da Rocha in the parish of Câmara de Lobos, the canon Francisco Cândido Correia Henriques built a chapel dedicated to the martyr São Cândido in the year 1732, and made the necessary endowment on May 16 of the same year. It is now in ruins (1921).

Fonte da Rocha: Location where the chapel of São Cândido was built.

Francisco Cândido Correia Henriques: Built the chapel of São Cândido in 1732.

1732: Construction of the chapel of São Cândido.
